1.title: Don't Get Too Attached

episode of.title: How to Marry a Vampire (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

1.plot: Join us for the first installment of the chronicles of a doomed reality show that set out to record the first ever dating show to feature a real-life vampire. Everyone vanished and only these tapes remain.

2.title: Adam Is Over His Head

episode of.title: How to Marry a Vampire (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

2.plot: As Adam contemplates his mortality at the hands of studio execs, Drake C., a stage magician, tries to delight Millarca with his whimsical charm. Also, we meet Raoul, a cat in a human body from New Orleans.

3.title: Meet Drake... And Meet Drake

episode of.title: How to Marry a Vampire (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

3.plot: Drake O. shows off his burial skills while Drake L. talks "stuff."Millarca knows Fenrik is a bad boy, but doesn't know that he came on the show to kill her.

4.title: Snakeoil & Smoothtalkin'

episode of.title: How to Marry a Vampire (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

4.plot: Meet the slippery Zachary, the smooth Edgar, and the, well - Sketchy - Sketch.

5.title: The Blood Donor

episode of.title: How to Marry a Vampire (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

5.plot: Millarca makes a big first impression on Blood Donor Wes. Meanwhile, celebrity host Ian Fyfield explains the rules to the unruly bachelors. Will Adam be able to call his mom? Will Drake C. find a coin? Are any of us even alive?

6.title: You're Invited In...

episode of.title: How to Marry a Vampire (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

6.plot: Millarca and the contestants participate in the show's first-ever Elimination Ceremony.

imdb.plot outline: A group of men hope to find love with a real life vampire. Among them are a taxidermist, a stage magician, a drug dealer, a cat trapped in a human's body, and a caterer, among others. But do they know the risks of getting rejected by a murderous mistress...?
imdb.title: How to Marry a Vampire
akas: How to Marry a Vampire (United States)
plot: Millarca is an ex-bride of Dracula looking for love. Will she find it on this new TV show? Only one contestant will be the winner. The rest will be dinner.

A group of men hope to find love with a real life vampire. Among them are a taxidermist, a stage magician, a drug dealer, a cat trapped in a human's body, and a caterer, among others. But do they know the risks of getting rejected by a murderous mistress...?
